autoInsertSpaceInButton.description: When set to 'false', remove the space between the 2 kanji in the button
autoInsertSpaceInButton.description_zh: 设置为 `false` 时，移除按钮中 2 个汉字之间的空格

componentSize.description_zh: 设置 antd 组件大小

direction.description: Set the direction in which the text is displayed. [Example] (#components-config-provider-demo-direction)
direction.description_zh: 设置文本展示方向。 [示例](#components-config-provider-demo-direction)

dropdownMatchSelectWidth.description: The drop-down menu is the same width as the selector. 'min-width' is set by default and is ignored when the value is less than the width of the selection box. 'false' turns off virtual scrolling
dropdownMatchSelectWidth.description_zh: 下拉菜单和选择器同宽。默认将设置 `min-width`，当值小于选择框宽度时会被忽略。`false` 时会关闭虚拟滚动

:form.description: Sets the common properties of the Form component
:form.type: { validateMessages?: [ValidateMessages]( | components | form | #validatemessages), requiredMark?: boolean | optional, colon?: boolean}
:form.description_zh: 设置 Form 组件的通用属性

:getPopupContainer.description: Popovers (Select, Tooltip, Menu, etc.) render the parent node, which is rendered to the body by default.
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 弹出框（Select, Tooltip, Menu 等等）渲染父节点，默认渲染到 body 上。

:getTargetContainer.description: Configure the Affix and Anchor scrolling listening containers.
:getTargetContainer.description_zh: 配置 Affix、Anchor 滚动监听容器。

:input.description: Sets the common properties of the Input component
:input.description_zh: 设置 Input 组件的通用属性

locale.description: Language pack configuration, which can be found in the [ant-design-vue/es/locale](http://unpkg.com/ant-design-vue/es/locale/) directory
locale.description_zh: 语言包配置，语言包可到 [ant-design-vue/es/locale](http://unpkg.com/ant-design-vue/es/locale/) 目录下寻找

:pageHeader.description: Set the ghost of pageHeader uniformly, refer to [pageHeader](<(/components/page-header)>)
:pageHeader.description_zh: 统一设置 pageHeader 的 ghost，参考 [pageHeader](<(/components/page-header)>)

prefixCls.description: Set the uniform style prefix. Note: It needs to be used with the 'less' variable '@ant-prefix'
prefixCls.description_zh: 设置统一样式前缀。注意：需要配合 `less` 变量 `@ant-prefix` 使用

:renderEmpty.description: Customize the empty state of the component. Refer to [empty state](/components/empty/)
:renderEmpty.description_zh: 自定义组件空状态。参考 [空状态](/components/empty/)

space.description: Set the 'size' of the space, refer to [Space](/components/space)

:transformCellText.description: Table data can be changed again before rendering, and the default configuration of empty data for general users
:transformCellText.type: Function({ text, column, record, index }) => any
:transformCellText.description_zh: Table 数据渲染前可以再次改变，一般用户空数据的默认配置

virtual.description: Turn off virtual scrolling when 'false' is set
virtual.description_zh: 设置 `false` 时关闭虚拟滚动
